t: Luna: Cloud Gaming from Amazon - App on Amazon Appstore
s: Amazon Luna lets you play your favorite games on devices you already own. Prime members can jump on the Battle Bus and play Fortnite, try out Luna's library with a rotating selection of games, or play select PC games they already own - included in their Prime membership.
